TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MethodInvoker extends System.MulticastDelegate

summary.span: 表示一个委托，该委托可执行托管代码中声明为 void 且不接受任何参数的任何方法。

span.span: Represents a delegate that can execute any method in managed code that is declared void and takes no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一个简单的委托，可用于调用具有 void 参数列表的方法。 provides a simple delegate that is used to invoke a method with a void parameter list. 进行调用的控件时，可以使用此委托方法，或当你需要一个简单委派但不是希望定义一个您自己。This delegate can be used when making calls to a control's method, or when you need a simple delegate but do not want to define one yourself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用调用更新应用程序窗体的标题栏的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to call a method that updates the title bar of the application form. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.methodinvoker/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.methodinvoker/vb/form1.vb#1)]
